name: Aster - SA Game Jam 2018
description:
Follow the progress here as well as see other games from the jam:
SA Game Jam On MGSA

Some Controls:

  • Esc/Enter -> Exits to main menu
  • Num-[0 to 7] -> Skip to checkpoints (use it only if you are stuck)
  • R -> Respawn to last checkpoint

P.S. Take The Leap
